hypothesis_content.title: PEPE Mean Reversion After Extreme Social Sentiment Spikes
hypothesis_content.statement: When PEPE experiences >300% increase in social volume (CryptoPanic/Santiment) combined with >15% price surge in 4 hours, it mean reverts -8% to -12% over the next 12 hours with 70% probability during NEUTRAL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: PEPE's purely speculative nature makes it vulnerable to pump-and-dump patterns. Extreme social volume spikes indicate FOMO top formation. During neutral regimes (not strong bull), these spikes reliably precede profit-taking.
entry_conditions: Social volume metrics show >300% spike vs 7-day average
Funding rates turn extremely positive (>0.05% per 8h)

exit_conditions.take_profit: -10% from entry price OR 12 hours, whichever comes first

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: PEPE continues rallying after extreme social spikes during neutral regimes, or shows no predictable mean reversion pattern.
